17 out of 43 scanners say it is infected with a trojan. But most scanners see trainers as trojans. If you want to be absolutely sure, then disable internet before using this trainer. I tested this trainer yesterday myself and it works flawlessly...
If you want to get legitimate trainers, just download them from gamecopyworld, the Haxor ones are usually the most stable.
